summary.para: Specifies a client signature when a call to the function cannot access the private key for a client certificate (in this case, the function returns SEC_I_SIGNATURE_NEEDED).

remarks.para: Add a client signature to a client context by using this structure as the value of the pInput parameter in a call to the function.

summary.para: The size, in bytes, of this structure.
The ID of the algorithm used to compute the hash of the certificate.
The size, in bytes, of the HashValue array.
An array of byte values that specify the hash of the certificate.
An array of byte values that specify the certificate thumbprint.
